document.full_text: auditor ernst and young llp  must face a lawsuit over its role in a $2.2 billion stock options backdating scheme at broadcom corp , a u.s. appeals court ruled.
document.title: court revives backdating lawsuit against ernst
lines_and_colors: auditor ernst and young llp  must face a lawsuit over its role in a $2.2 billion stock options backdating scheme at broadcom corp , a u.s. appeals court ruled.
